description: Descubre los mejores hoteles en Wakaya Island, Fiji. Encuentra ofertas exclusivas y alojamientos de lujo.

hotels.title: Five-Star Fijian Paradise on Private Island
hotels.description: Escape to the dazzling white sands and surreal turquoise waters of Fiji with a once-in-a-lifetime stay at Wakaya Club & Spa. This breathtaking oasis is located on its own private island, where you are free to explore and swim at your leisure. Indulge in daily yoga and meditation to make the most of every morning, feel rejuvenated after a massage or treatment at the Breeze Spa, and experience authentic dining at The Palm Grove, Baravi Lai Lai or picnics on their private beaches.
